Player History
Released by San Diego on 10/25/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Released by Toronto on 5/26/1989...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 4/3/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $1,164,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 6/4/1990...
Traded from Pittsburgh to San Diego on 7/5/1990 (Going to PIT: P Masumi Kuwata, P Mark Wohlers. Going to SD: P Craig Lefferts)...
Had first career hit on 10/3/1990, off Roger Clemens (LAD)...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,164,000 through salary arbitration...
